title: NBC's Mike Tirico ready to pull off an Olympic-sized feat at Super Bowl

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: NBC's Mike Tirico ready to pull off an Olympic-sized feat at Super Bowl
sources.description: Mike Tirico will be NBC's play-by-play announcer for Super Bowl LX on Sunday in addition to hosting the network's Milan-Cortina Olympics coverage from Levi's Stadium.
